topic.title: SHORT TERM RECALL RATE FOLLOWING ASSESSMENT (PERCENTAGE OF SCREENED)
topic.shortdesc: SHORT TERM RECALL RATE FOLLOWING ASSESSMENT (PERCENTAGE OF SCREENED) is the percentage of women with a BREAST ASSESSMENT OUTCOME recorded as National Code 'Short term recall'.
